name: The Deepest Expedition
description:
Hey, first Jam here !

This is a Rogue Like - Platformer game, the goal is to defeat the boss awaiting in the last room.

Controls are :

# A & D to move left & right

# W to jump &  S to fall fast on the ground

# Q & E to dash left & right

# Mouse left clic to aim and kill enemies

Also sorry for the lack of music in the game, I didn't find the time to make something correct.

Good luck !
